headingDescription: Stream all of these great kids shows for free!

shows.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
shows.description: Danger lies ahead for SpongeBob as he sets out to recover a crown!
shows.descriptionEpg: David Hasselhoff stars in this part-animated adventure comedy. When Spongebob's boss is suspected of stealing King Neptune's crown, the adventurous sponge sets out to get it back.

shows.title: Mr Bean: Animated Series
shows.description: The animated antics of hapless bumbler (and chronic mumbler) Mr Bean
shows.descriptionEpg: Animation based on the popular TV series. The hapless bachelor, Mr Bean, lives with his brown teddy bear, he has a long-suffering girlfriend, and he is always getting into trouble!

shows.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
shows.description: It's panda Po vs a supernatural villain in this high-kicking sequel
shows.descriptionEpg: High-kicking sequel featuring the voices of Jack Black and Bryan Cranston. When Po visits panda paradise, he must train a village of his brethren to fight a supernatural villain.

shows.title: Penguins of Madagascar
shows.description: John Malkovich & Benedict Cumberbatch lend their voices to this spin-off
shows.descriptionEpg: John Malkovich & Benedict Cumberbatch lend their voices to this comedy spin-off. The Madagascar penguins join an undercover group.

shows.title: The Sound Collector
shows.description: Crack, gurgle, hissss - hear the sounds of the sea with Keira Knightley
shows.descriptionEpg: It's Deaf Awareness Week - join Keira Knightley as she narrates this adorable animated series about sound. Hear the world through the ears of a little Sound Collector.

shows.title: Stuart Little
shows.description: Michael J Fox & Hugh Laurie lend their voices in this sweet kids comedy
shows.descriptionEpg: Part-animation family adventure comedy film featuring the voice of Michael J Fox and starring Hugh Laurie. A family adopt a charming young mouse, but their cat hates the idea.

shows.title: Ninjago: Dragon's Rising
shows.description: Spinjitzu Master needed for training of new heroes... series 2 now added
shows.descriptionEpg: After several realms combine to form one unstable realm, a Spinjitzu Master must train new heroes. They must save the world from the forces of evil by finding elemental dragons.

shows.title: Scooby-Doo! and WWE: Curse of the Speed Demon
shows.description: This is one very strange race... Scooby-Doo & the gang go off-road

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: Meet Masha - a spirited girl who lives with a bear - new series added!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Sing 2
shows.description: Remember those tippy toes! Matthew McConaughey in the hit sequel
shows.descriptionEpg: Comedy sequel starring the voices of Matthew McConaughey & Reese Witherspoon. Buster Moon and his friends try to get a reclusive rock star out of retirement. Remember: tippy toes!

shows.title: Teen Titans Go!
shows.description: Don't panic, people of earth... your crime-busting superheroes are here!
shows.descriptionEpg: Animated series based on DC Comics' superhero team. Robin, Cyborg, Starfire, Raven and Beast Boy love saving the world. But when they stop fighting crime, things don't go to plan.

shows.title: Scooby-Doo! Mask of the Blue Falcon
shows.description: Terror at a comic book convention... and who wants revenge?

shows.title: Hotel Transylvania
shows.description: Dracula's away - can his daughter Mavis show her dad what she's made of?
shows.descriptionEpg: Dracula is away on "special vampire business" so it's a chance for his daughter to show her dad that she can run the hotel - but will her Aunt Lydia get in the way?

shows.title: Deep in the Bowl
shows.description: A big adventure in a small bowl? Yes please! New eps now added
shows.descriptionEpg: Kid's animation. If you thought you couldn't have a big adventure in a small bowl, think again! Join these shoals of funny fish trying to decode humans and their strange habits.

shows.title: Mystery Lane
shows.description: Pets on patrol... a guinea pig & her bro solve unusual cases in London
shows.descriptionEpg: Children's mystery series about Clever, a young guinea pig with extraordinary analysis capacities. She and her brother Bro lead unusual investigations in London.

shows.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
shows.description: They're back & they're battling the swamp monsters on their summer trip
shows.descriptionEpg: The Scooby gang are together this summer, but monsters and ghouls get in the way of their adventures. Will they survive?

shows.title: 50/50 Heroes
shows.description: Standout animation - half-siblings Mo & Sam have super half-powers
shows.descriptionEpg: Mo and Sam are half-siblings and have powers… well, half-powers. Managing their abilities isn't easy when they need to do everything together. And living their daily life is a challenge.

shows.title: Barbie
shows.description: She's all that! Join Barbie on gorgeous adventures with her friends
shows.descriptionEpg: Collection of iconic Barbie adventures. Join her as she becomes a gymnast, a ballerina and a mermaid princess in these adaptations of classic fairy tales, ballet and books.

shows.title: Lloyd of the Flies
shows.description: He's only one centimetre high but Lloyd is a fly with a lot to prove
shows.descriptionEpg: He's one centimetre high, but Lloyd is a fly with a lot to prove. He lives in an apple with 225 maggots, and he's always getting into scrapes with his friend Abacus the woodlouse.

shows.title: Mr Magoo
shows.description: Everyone's favourite accident-prone millionaire is back - new eps added
shows.descriptionEpg: Look out! Everyone's favourite accident-prone millionaire is here. He's old, he's rich, he's extremely short-sighted & he's very stubborn. What on earth will he get up to next?

shows.title: Winx Club
shows.description: Skip along with six fairies whose super-heroine powers defeat evil!
shows.descriptionEpg: Modern children's fantasy - follow six fairies who can turn into superheroines to defeat evil and save anyone in danger. Every fairy has specific powers!

shows.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
shows.description: When disaster strikes... International Rescue answers the call!
shows.descriptionEpg: When disaster strikes... International Rescue answers the call!

shows.title: What's New Scooby Doo?
shows.description: All your favourite characters are back - with plenty of new mysteries!
shows.descriptionEpg: Whilst trying out sand-building and visiting video games conventions, Scooby-Doo and the Mystery gang are launched into the 21st century, with new mysteries to solve.

shows.title: Teen Titans Go!
shows.description: Don't panic, people of earth... your crime-busting superheroes are here!
shows.descriptionEpg: Animated series based on DC Comics' superhero team. Robin, Cyborg, Starfire, Raven and Beast Boy love saving the world. But when they stop fighting crime, things don't go to plan.

shows.title: Ninjago: Dragon's Rising
shows.description: Spinjitzu Master needed for training of new heroes... series 2 now added
shows.descriptionEpg: After several realms combine to form one unstable realm, a Spinjitzu Master must train new heroes. They must save the world from the forces of evil by finding elemental dragons.

shows.title: Lego Dreamzzz
shows.description: The Dream World is under attack - friends to the rescue!
shows.descriptionEpg: Fun-packed kids animation. The Dream World is under attack! Five friends Mateo, Izzie, Cooper, Logan and Zoey become Dream Chasers to protect innocent dreamers from his evil plans.

shows.title: LEGO Chima
shows.description: Welcome to a magical world ruled by animals! But who are the enemies?
shows.descriptionEpg: Children's LEGO animation. Welcome to Chima, a magical world of nature and wonder. The animals are all best friends, until an unfortunate series of events changes everything.

shows.title: LEGO Ninjago
shows.description: Threats incoming! Peace is disturbed in the land of Ninjago...
shows.descriptionEpg: Six ninja, Kai, Jay, Cole, Zane, Lloyd and Nya are fighting against the forces of evil. Now they face even greater threats that risk disturbing the peace in the land of Ninjago.

shows.title: Nexo Knights
shows.description: Join these young knights in a brave battle to protect their kingdom
shows.descriptionEpg: Children's animation - join the brave Nexo Knights in a battle to protect the Kingdom of Knighton from Jester, Jestro, the Book of Monsters and the army of Lava Monsters.

shows.title: LEGO Ninjago: Way of the Ninja
shows.description: Sibling blacksmiths Kai and Nya meet a mysterious old wanderer
shows.descriptionEpg: Animation inspired by LEGO's hit Ninjago series. A team of young ninja confront the forces of evil, removing threats, searching for lost cities and finding skeletons along the way.

shows.title: LEGO Hiddenside
shows.description: Two young friends share spooky adventures - stream them now
shows.descriptionEpg: Two young friends share spooky adventures capturing ghosts with their mobile phones.

shows.title: LEGO Ninjago: Decoded
shows.description: Hackers, a mystery puzzle & a virus - the team have a lot to tackle!
shows.descriptionEpg: Animated series inspired by LEGO's popular Ninjago series.

shows.title: Ninjago: Wu's Teas
shows.description: Tea vs coffee... should Sensei Wu be worried about his new rival?
shows.descriptionEpg: Sensei Wu has a new Tea Shop, called Steeper Wisdom, where he sells rare teas with magical properties. It's doing really well until a new rival coffee shop opens across the street!

shows.title: Marvel Superheroes: Maximum Overload
shows.description: Prepare to be punked by the hand of Loki! Can anyone take him down?

shows.title: Jurassic World: The Secret Exhibit
shows.description: Deliver the dinosaurs & get paid - nothing could ever go wrong, could it?
shows.descriptionEpg: Animated LEGO prequel adventure. For Owen Grady it was an easy job - deliver the dinosaurs and get paid. Nothing could go wrong, could it?

shows.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of the Spinjitzu
shows.description: Go, go, go, brave ninja - fight those evil forces!
shows.descriptionEpg: Animation inspired by LEGO's hit Ninjago series. A team of young ninja confront the forces of evil, removing threats, searching for lost cities and finding skeletons along the way.

shows.descriptionEpg: The ultimate sports competition! Ten elite athletes compete in other people's sports. But can they learn new skills to persevere and overcome their own physical and mental limits?!

shows.title: Bajillionaires
shows.description: Running your own business can be hard… especially when you’re 12!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Max, the 12-year-old CEO with a simple dream: invent an amazing product, change the world and maybe even make a bajillion dollars… all from his parents’ garage.

shows.title: The Gamers 2037
shows.description: Join three former besties-turned enemies on this crazy mission
shows.descriptionEpg: Game-changing children's series. Three former besties-turned-bitter acquaintances must work together to beat a game... or risk become trapped in there forever.

shows.title: Makeaway Takeaway
shows.description: Recycle your pencil sharpeners & get stuck into the funniest art show
shows.descriptionEpg: Get stuck into the funniest art show around. Whether it's creative solutions for smelly feet or ideas on puppet building, Bec Hill brings her top tips for crafty first aid.

shows.title: Mini Movies
shows.description: Flying fairies & cool dinosaur chases - kids become real film stars
shows.descriptionEpg: Families provide footage for the Mini Movies team to turn into films. Kids could fly like fairies, turn into robots or be chased by dinosaurs - they're the heroes of their stories.

shows.title: Overlord & The Underwoods
shows.description: Jump into the comic misadventures of a family & an evil overlord!
shows.descriptionEpg: Sci-fi comedy series about an evil overlord who flees from his home planet and seeks a home on Earth. When he takes refuge with a suburban family, misadventures ensue...

shows.title: Inspector Sunshine
shows.description: Ditch the fear & crack the case! One teen & a very unlikely holiday

shows.title: A Horse Called Wish
shows.description: Get stuck into this inspirational tale of belonging. Best hoof forward!

shows.title: Game On
shows.description: Being a teen is cringey enough - imagine if it was all broadcast live!
shows.descriptionEpg: Day-to-day adventures of 14-year-old Toby Martin. Imagine every embarrassing, mortifying, cringe-worthy moment of being a teenager broadcast to the world. That's Toby average day!

shows.title: HOW
shows.description: Can dust combust? Vick, Sam & Frankie ask the ultimate questions
shows.descriptionEpg: How can dust combust? How do you shake a sundae? In this upbeat kids' show, Vick Hope, Sam Homewood & Frankie Vu ask the ultimate questions beginning with 'how'.

collection.headingTitle: Films for the family.... Popcorn at the ready!

shows.title: Sing 2
shows.description: Remember those tippy toes! Matthew McConaughey in the hit sequel
shows.descriptionEpg: Comedy sequel starring the voices of Matthew McConaughey & Reese Witherspoon. Buster Moon and his friends try to get a reclusive rock star out of retirement. Remember: tippy toes!

shows.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
shows.description: Danger lies ahead for SpongeBob as he sets out to recover a crown!
shows.descriptionEpg: David Hasselhoff stars in this part-animated adventure comedy. When Spongebob's boss is suspected of stealing King Neptune's crown, the adventurous sponge sets out to get it back.

shows.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
shows.description: It's panda Po vs a supernatural villain in this high-kicking sequel
shows.descriptionEpg: High-kicking sequel featuring the voices of Jack Black and Bryan Cranston. When Po visits panda paradise, he must train a village of his brethren to fight a supernatural villain.

shows.title: Penguins of Madagascar
shows.description: John Malkovich & Benedict Cumberbatch lend their voices to this spin-off
shows.descriptionEpg: John Malkovich & Benedict Cumberbatch lend their voices to this comedy spin-off. The Madagascar penguins join an undercover group.

shows.title: Scoob!
shows.description: A ghost, a dogpocalypse - could this be the most challenging mystery?!
shows.descriptionEpg: Scooby-Doo and the gang face their most challenging mystery yet in the form of a plot to unleash a ghost dog called Cerberus, as they race to stop this 'dogpocalypse'.

shows.title: Scooby-Doo! Mask of the Blue Falcon
shows.description: Terror at a comic book convention... and who wants revenge?

shows.title: Stuart Little
shows.description: Michael J Fox & Hugh Laurie lend their voices in this sweet kids comedy
shows.descriptionEpg: Part-animation family adventure comedy film featuring the voice of Michael J Fox and starring Hugh Laurie. A family adopt a charming young mouse, but their cat hates the idea.

shows.title: Scooby-Doo! Stage Fright
shows.description: Scooby gets the fright of his life - poor old Scooby!

shows.title: Scooby-Doo! and WWE: Curse of the Speed Demon
shows.description: This is one very strange race... Scooby-Doo & the gang go off-road

shows.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
shows.description: Life's a circus! Starring the voices of Ben Stiller & Jada Pinkett Smith
shows.descriptionEpg: Adventure comedy sequel starring the voices of Ben Stiller and Jada Pinkett Smith. The Madagascar animals are trying to get back to the Big Apple - could a circus be the answer?!

shows.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
shows.description: George Clooney takes on the farm in Wes Anderson's top comedy
shows.descriptionEpg: George Clooney and Meryl Streep voice Wes Anderson's animation of Roald Dahl’s classic tale. The life of two foxes descends into chaos when Mr Fox plots a gigantic chicken heist.

shows.title: The Boxtrolls
shows.description: This little guy has a daring plan to save his pals in this quirky comedy
shows.descriptionEpg: Ben Kingsley and Jared Harris lend their voices to this quirky adventure comedy. An orphan sets out a daring plan to save the lives of his misfit (and pretty mischievous) pals.

shows.title: Teletubbies Let's Go!
shows.description: Time to play with all the sun babies Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa & Po
shows.descriptionEpg: Preschool series based on the iconic 90s TV show. Welcome to the well-known characters of Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po, alongside lots of other sweet new sun babies.

shows.title: The Sound Collector
shows.description: Crack, gurgle, hissss - hear the sounds of the sea with Keira Knightley
shows.descriptionEpg: It's Deaf Awareness Week - join Keira Knightley as she narrates this adorable animated series about sound. Hear the world through the ears of a little Sound Collector.

shows.title: Bob the Builder
shows.description: There are houses to build & power failures to sort - can he fix them?
shows.descriptionEpg: Animated kids series about a happy builder and his team. There are garages and houses to build, pop-up shops to construct and power failures to fix - can they get to them all?

shows.title: Sooty
shows.description: Follow the mischievous adventures of puppets Sooty, Sweep & Soo!
shows.descriptionEpg: Fifth incarnation of the slapstick kids puppet show. Follow the mischievous adventures of Sooty, Sweep and Soo - there's a crazy hoover on the loose, sports day, and a magic show!

shows.title: Interstellar Ella
shows.description: It's time for a trip to the Milky Way... in the year 3021!
shows.descriptionEpg: In the year 3021, on a space station somewhere between Mars and Jupiter in the Milky Way, eight-year-old Ella Ryder sets out with her friends on exciting adventures of discovery.

shows.title: Riley Rocket
shows.description: Join the talented young Riley on a musical adventure - new series!
shows.descriptionEpg: Join young Riley on an action-packed musical adventure! Riley and her band are actually superheroes in disguise who use the power of music to save the day. Baddies beware!

shows.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
shows.description: There’s no problem too small for these two twins - new eps added!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet the twin brothers who dream big! With imagination, creativity, grit and heart, there’s no build too big and no problem too small for the brothers and their crew to handle.

shows.title: Signed Stories
shows.description: Magical flowers & scary beasts - join a very merry group of storytellers
shows.descriptionEpg: Best-selling children’s books presented with sign language, animation, illustrations and subtitles. Featuring magical flowers and fearsome beasties from tales including Cinderella.

shows.title: BFF Cry Babies
shows.description: If the going gets tough, remember: best friends forever!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet the group of teens who go through difficult situations but as best friends forever! Who needs to let one bad character spread bad vibrations through life's funny adventures?!

shows.title: Oddbods: Zee Force Five
shows.description: Many hands make light work... unless they belong to Zee!
shows.descriptionEpg: Adorable sketch-based series following the playful adventures of seven adorable creatures, Fuse, Newt, Pogo, Bubbles, Jeff, Zee and Slick.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: Meet Masha - a spirited girl who lives with a bear - new series added!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Oddbods
shows.description: Follow the quirky adventures of the adorable Fuse, Newt, Pogo & Bubbles
shows.descriptionEpg: Adorable sketch-based series following the playful adventures of seven adorable creatures, Fuse, Newt, Pogo, Bubbles, Jeff, Zee and Slick.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: A circus bear settles into the woods, preparing for a quiet new life, then he meets Masha.
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: We follow the adventures of a little girl named Masha and her friend, The Bear.
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: A circus bear settles into the woods, preparing for a quiet new life, then he meets Masha.
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: A circus bear settles into the woods, preparing for a quiet new life, then he meets Masha.
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: Meet Masha - a spirited girl who lives with a bear - new series added!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: The wolves are up to no good and rob a poultry farm!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.contentInfo: S4, E4. From England with Love
shows.description: A new lovely friend from foggy England gets lost in the forest.
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.contentInfo: S5, E10. Love is in the Bear
shows.description: Ah, love! Bear prepares a gift for the Lady Bear!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: Masha has a sister named Dasha. Once upon a time Dasha decides to visit her sister.
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: Masha wants to learn ice skating. But there's nobody around to teach her.
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.description: Summer is a time of rest and miracles and to play with your friends of course!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Masha and the Bear
shows.contentInfo: S4, E7. Tales from the East
shows.description: A magic genie appears in Bear's dreams!
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Masha - a spirited young girl who lives in the woods with a friendly bear. Follow their madcap adventures.

shows.title: Ollie
shows.description: Everyone is welcome to head to the park with Ollie the owl and his pals
shows.descriptionEpg: In the middle of a cosy park in a busy city live Ollie the little blue owl and his friends, a small stork, a young frog and five little birds. We are all very welcome to meet them.

shows.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
shows.description: The wackiest of vehicles & the looniest builds ever - get involved!
shows.descriptionEpg: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety as use their wacky vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. On the way, they learn valuable lessons and never give up!

shows.title: Happy the Hoglet
shows.description: Don't judge a hoglet by his prickles - Happy's life is always fun!
shows.descriptionEpg: An animated series for preschoolers about the prickly, smelly, flea-bitten Happy. Life with his pals has its ups and downs, but it is always full of laughs and adventure.

shows.title: Pingu in the City
shows.description: What a lot of mischief! This little penguin always gets into scrapes
shows.descriptionEpg: Pingu and his family move from their small village to a city. The ever-curious penguin tries out many jobs, but his mischievous side often gets the better of him. Naughty naughty!

shows.title: Claude
shows.description: Follow the adventures of a beret-wearing dog & his pal Sir Bobblysock
shows.descriptionEpg: Based on the best-selling series of books by Alex T. Smith, Claude follows the adventures of a beret-wearing dog, Claude, and his friend, Sir Bobblysock, in the town of Pawhaven.

shows.title: Mumfie
shows.description: Mumfie the elephant can always looks on the bright side of life
shows.descriptionEpg: The fun happenings of an optimistic young elephant called Mumfie and his best friends Pinkey and Jelly Bean. Mumfie tries out all sorts of activities

shows.title: The Hive
shows.description: They're tiny, stripy & buzz around a lot - sweet pre-schooler animation
shows.descriptionEpg: This friendly animation for pre-schoolers is based around Bee family, who live in Honeybee Hive. Pappa Bee, Mamma Bee, Buzzbee and Rubee are tiny, stripy and buzz around a lot!

shows.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
shows.description: There's all sorts of treasure to find on the beach!
shows.descriptionEpg: Gentle animation about a little girl called Lily, who dreams up a world of fun and adventure with animal friends. She makes treasure out of everything that she finds on the beach.

shows.title: Poppy Cat
shows.description: The extraordinary adventures of a bandana-wearing kitten
shows.descriptionEpg: Meet Lara, who writes fantastical adventures for her cat Poppy. With a flick of her patchwork bandana, she and her pals are taken to wonderful places, from space to submarines.

shows.title: Pip Ahoy!
shows.description: Secret forest trails & island adventures - Pip's always on the go!
shows.descriptionEpg: Animated show following the adventures of a puppy named Pip and his best friend, a kitten named Alba. They visit island beaches, secret forest trails and many other excitements!

shows.title: Pip Ahoy! Christmas Special
shows.description: Salty Cove is almost ready for Christmas - enter Pip with his surprise!
